title: Former Operations Chief Exiled For Innocent Charges Becomes The Strongest Adventurer. - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Army   Betrayal   Depictions of Cruelty   Female Protagonist   Military   Nobles   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Revenge   Sword And Magic
author: Tsugaya   津ヶ谷
description: Blonde vertical roll Musou-I was deported for innocent charges, but as soon as I became an S-rank adventurer, I was told to come back, but I will not return. The country where I left seems to have weakened sharply.>
